definition: Zhang Sengyou (active c. 490-540), one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art)/picture created using this technique

lit. three humble visits to a thatched cottage/cf famous episode in the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义 in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮 (the Hidden Dragon 臥龍|卧龙) to his cause by visiting him three times
